i1.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Shyvana''' deals 20% '''bonus''' {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage to {{ui|Dragon|Dragons}}.

Additionally, '''Shyvana''' starts with {{sti|armor|{{as|5 '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|5 '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, which is permanently increased by 5 for every [[Dragon|elemental drake]] ({{ui|Cloud Drake}}, {{ui|Infernal Drake}}, {{ui|Mountain Drake}}, and {{ui|Ocean Drake}}) and {{ui|Elder Dragon}} her team slays.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Shyvana deals 20% bonus physical and magic damage to Dragons.Additionally, Shyvana starts with 5 bonus armor and 5 bonus magic resistance, which is permanently increased by 5 for every Dragon (Cloud Drake, Infernal Drake, Mountain Drake, and Ocean Drake) and Elder Dragon her team slays.

q1.name: Twin Bite
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds causes her to strike again after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
The second strike applies {{tip|on-hit}} and [[on-attack]] effects and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
'''Shyvana's''' basic attacks reduce ''Twin Bite's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{fd|0.5}} seconds [[on-hit]].
''Twin Bite'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Shyvana's''' basic attack timer.

{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} '''Shyvana''' instantly attacks all enemies in a cone around her target before applying ''Twin Bite's'' effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}, are affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers, and apply [[on-hit]] effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} nor trigger [[on-attack]] effects, but it will still apply [[on-hit]] effects. Additionally, ''Twin Bite's'' empowered attack becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Shyvana's next basic attack within 6 seconds causes her to strike again after 0.25 seconds, dealing bonus physical damage.The second strike applies on-hit and on-attack effects and is affected by critical strike modifiers.Shyvana's basic attacks reduce Twin Bite's cooldown by 0.5 seconds on-hit.Twin Bite resets Shyvana's basic attack timer.Dragon Form: Shyvana instantly attacks all enemies in a cone around her target before applying Twin Bite's effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal 100% AD physical damage, are affected by critical strike modifiers, and apply on-hit effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot critically strike nor trigger on-attack effects, but it will still apply on-hit effects. Additionally, Twin Bite's empowered attack becomes unstoppable.
q1.notes:
*''Dragon Form's'' ''Twin Bite'' cannot apply {{iis|Tiamat}} {{nie|Cleave}} on each target hit because of {{nies|Cleave}} internal {{fd|0.05}} seconds interval during which it cannot be applied on a different target.
* Since the second strike applies after the ability goes on cooldown, it will reduce its own cooldown.
* Unlike most [[on-hit]] effects, the one reducing the cooldown of ''Twin Bite'' also triggers against {{tip|turret|structures}}.
* In ''Dragon Form'', ''Twin Bite'' consumes an additional stack of {{ri|Hail of Blades}}. {{bug}}

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: % AD

w1.name: Burnout
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' surrounds herself in flames for 3 seconds, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to surrounding enemies each second.

Basic attacking an enemy while ''Burnout'' is active deals 25% of ''Burnout's'' damage to all enemies surrounding '''Shyvana''' and, against non-structures, extends ''Burnout's'' duration by 1 second, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum total duration of 7 seconds.
{{sti|ms|{{as|'''Bonus''' movement speed}}}} decays linearly over the duration.
{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} ''Burnout'' has increased effect radius, scaling with {{ais|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}} rank.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Shyvana surrounds herself in flames for 3 seconds, gaining bonus movement speed and dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies each second.Basic attacking an enemy while Burnout is active deals 25% of Burnout's damage to all enemies surrounding Shyvana and, against non-structures, extends Burnout's duration by 1 second, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum total duration of 7 seconds.Bonus movement speed decays linearly over the duration.Dragon Form: Burnout has increased effect radius, scaling with Dragon's Descent's rank.
leveling:

-->{{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|20 to 70}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
w1.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: {{as|Magic damage}} on-hit's interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

e1.name: Flame Breath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' unleashes a fireball in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.
'''Shyvana's''' basic attacks against marked enemies deal {{as|{{fd|3.75}}% of the target's {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped at 150 against monsters.

{{sbc|{{ai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana|Dragon Form}}:}} ''Flame Breath'' explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the target location, dealing increased {{as|magic damage}} to them and surrounding enemies and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies standing on scorched earth take {{passive progression/deprecated version|13|30 to 60|6 to 18|formula=30 + 2.5 per level|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 5% AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy champion and dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.Shyvana's basic attacks against marked enemies deal 3.75% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 150 against monsters.Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the target location, dealing increased magic damage to them and surrounding enemies and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies standing on scorched earth take Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 13 30 to 60 6 to 18 formula=30 + 2.5 per level color=magic damage (+ 5% AD) (+ 10% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Empowered Magic Damage|{{passive progression/deprecated version|13|100 to 160|6 to 18|formula= 100+5 per level}} +
{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* The fireball applies {{tip|area damage}} and the triggering basic attacks deal {{tip|proc damage}}.
** In ''Dragon Form'', the fiery explosion applies {{tip|area damage}} and the burning scorch deals {{tip|persistent area damage}} to all enemies within the area of effect.
* In ''Dragon Form'', both areas of effect will be centered on the first champion struck, not at the location the missile collided with them.
* ''Flame Breath'' will cast from wherever '''Shyvana''' is at the end of the cast time.
* {{Pending for test}}: {{as|Magic damage}} on-hit's interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

r1.name: Dragon's Descent
description: {{sbc|Passive - Fury:}} ''Dragon's Descent'' has no cooldown or initial cost but can only be activated while '''Shyvana''' has {{tip|fury|{{as|100 Fury}}}}. '''Shyvana''' passively generates {{as|Fury}} per second while she is alive and in human form, {{as|2 Fury}} per basic attack [[on-hit]] in either form, and {{as|100 Fury}} when ''Dragon's Descent'' is first learned.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Shyvana''' transforms into a ferocious dragon, becoming {{tip|displacement immune}}, {{tip|dash|dashing}} to the target location and {{tip|airborne|carrying}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies she passes through.

'''Shyvana's''' dragon form grants her {{sti|health|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}}, {{sti|range|'''bonus''' attack range}}, increased [[size]] and empowers her basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] at the cost of {{as|{{fd|2.5}} Fury}} per {{fd|0.5}} seconds, returning to human form once depleted.
r1.descriptionHtml: Passive - Fury: Dragon's Descent has no cooldown or initial cost but can only be activated while Shyvana has 100 Fury. Shyvana passively generates Fury per second while she is alive and in human form, 2 Fury per basic attack on-hit in either form, and 100 Fury when Dragon's Descent is first learned.Active: Shyvana transforms into a ferocious dragon, becoming displacement immune, dashing to the target location and carrying and dealing magic damage to all enemies she passes through.Shyvana's dragon form grants her bonus health, bonus attack range, increased size and empowers her basic Champion ability at the cost of 2.5 Fury per 0.5 seconds, returning to human form once depleted.
r1.notes:
* '''Shyvana''' is {{tip|displacement immune}} {{tt|on-cast|before cast time}} and the immunity lasts until the {{tip|dash}} ends.
* ''Dragon's Descent'' has a {{ap|100/(1 to 2)|round=2}} seconds effective cooldown when not attacking.
* {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace}} grants {{passive progression/deprecated version|4|key=%|type=stacks|10 to 10*4}} increased {{tip|Fury}} generation, for an effective cooldown when non attacking of:
** {{ap|100/((1 to 2)*1.1)|round=2}} with 1 {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|icononly=true}} stack.
** {{ap|100/((1 to 2)*1.2)|round=2}} with 2 {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|icononly=true}} stacks.
** {{ap|100/((1 to 2)*1.3)|round=2}} with 3 {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|icononly=true}} stacks.
** {{ap|100/((1 to 2)*1.4)|round=2}} with 4 {{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|icononly=true}} stacks.
* ''Dragon's Descent'' has a {{ap|100/5}} seconds effective duration when not attacking, but can last indefinitely when attacking continuously with {{as|{{ap|2.5/2*2}} ({{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|{{ap|2.5/(2*(1.1 to 1.4))*2 4|round=2}}}}) attack speed|as}} (without counting {{ai|Q|Shyvana}}) or {{as|{{ap|2.5/(2*4/3)*2}} ({{bi|Cloudbringer's Grace|{{ap|2.5/(2*(1.1 to 1.4)*4/3)*2 4|round=2}}}}) attack speed|as}} with {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.
r1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  {{as|{{fd|2.5}}|Fury}} as 2.5 and riot's value 0,0,0 as 0
